question: You are managing a house construction project. Painting takes 2 days, plumbing 3 days, and interior design depends on both. To schedule and calculate total duration, which algorithm will help?
A train system connects cities in a straight line. You want to quickly check if a city station is present in the schedule list of stations. Which data structure is most efficient?

You are designing a text editor’s “undo” feature. Each time a user types, you record the operation. When they press undo, the last operation should be reversed first. Which data structure is most suitable?

A company’s server system processes millions of queries per second. The queries are of different priority levels: emergency (highest), normal (medium), and background (lowest). The system should always serve the highest-priority query available first. Which data structure is best to implement this?

You are routing delivery trucks in a city. Each intersection is a node, and roads have travel times. To find the fastest delivery path from the warehouse to all customer houses, which algorithm should be used?
Statements: All artists are imaginative. Some engineers are artists. Which conclusion definitely follows?
A person starts facing North, then turns right, then right again, then left, and finally turns to face the opposite direction. Which direction is the person facing now?
Four tasks: A, C, D, B with rules: C must be done after A. B must be done after C. D must be done before B, and not immediately before B. Which of the following orders is valid?
Exactly one of the following statements is true: Ria: 'Sam finished the report.' Sam: 'Tia didn’t finish the report.' Tia: 'I finished the report.' Who finished the report?
Argument: 'Extending store hours will increase customer satisfaction because customers will have more time to shop.' Which is an assumption of the argument?
options: Customers value having more time to shop

question: Which law states that stress is directly proportional to strain within the elastic limit?
The unit of electrical resistance is:
Which type of cement is used for underwater construction?
Which of the following is non-volatile memory?
Which semiconductor device is commonly used as a switching element?
You are managing file dependencies in a compiler where one file must be compiled before another. Which algorithm is best suited to resolve the compilation order?
You want to store browser history where you can go back to the most recently visited page. Which data structure is ideal?
In a social network, you want to suggest friends-of-friends to a user. Which graph traversal will be most suitable?
You are scheduling multiple CPU tasks with different arrival times and priorities. Which scheduling approach is closest to this scenario?
You want to efficiently find the median in a running stream of numbers. Which data structure combination works best?
Statement: All dogs are animals. Some animals are cats. Which conclusion follows?
A person walks North, then East, then South, and finally West. He ends up at the starting point. What does this path form?
Five friends A, B, C, D, and E are sitting in a row. A is not next to B. C is not next to D. B is between C and E. Who is in the middle?
Two persons make statements. Person 1: 'Either I am lying or Person 2 is lying.' Person 2: 'I am telling the truth.' Who is lying?
Argument: 'Schools should introduce coding from primary classes as it improves problem solving.' Which assumption is being made?
options: All students want to become coders
Problem solving can be improved by coding
Coding is easy for all students
Schools do not teach problem solving now

question: Which law states that pressure applied to a confined fluid is transmitted equally in all directions?
Which device converts AC to DC?
In civil engineering, which instrument is used to measure horizontal and vertical angles in surveying?
Which type of memory is fastest in a computer system?
Which electronic component is widely used for signal amplification?
